message.raw:
Made the check boxes linked for compile/view/run
Made the engage/abort buttons linked

Implemented closing of h5 files in the group list
Copied over remaining functions from old runmanager.pyw to main.pyw

TODO:
- Save the "import" treeview
- Save list of opened groups
- Save state of other buttons/widgets
- Add button to clear all loaded globals files
- Implement auto recompile on change of global
- Implement shortcut (F6?) to toggle the autocompile on change checkbox.
- Implement delete compiled h5 files if not submitted to BLACS
- clean up/refactor code (especially folder selection)
- Implement better threading
- Hide the terminal window that pops up while labscripts are compiling (happens when calling popen(python labscript) I think)
